BIO

I'm not goal oriented, I'm routine oriented. Anything can be learned on the internet, for free. You just have to sit down and do the work.

The hardest part is following through. It's human instinct to just sit back and enjoy, or use what somebody else created. I am 50% driven creator, and 50% sleep enthusiast. I never know which half will win in the battle for tomorrow
